paper_abstract: The paper proposes a new high-quality approach to fast Monte-Carlo path-tracing. The key feature of the approach is screen-space filtering with the help of additional information (depth, normal direction, etc.) of the illumination separated from material color. It allows to reach high-quality and edge-aware filtering. The proposed method yields 1-2 times speed-up without putting significant restrictions on the raytracing algorithm.
paper_title: Practical approach to the fast Monte-Carlo ray-tracing
